participant_1.name: Linda
participant_1.personality: Introverted and reflective, with a love for literature, especially horror.
participant_1.background: I'd have lunch with myself. I like reading horror novels. My purse has a picture of a skunk on it. I have been married for 20 years. I do not have a job and sit on the couch all day.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, with a passion for fitness and helping others.
participant_2.background: Helping people and trying new things are two of my favorite things to do. I like the feeling of being in shape and being able to do well in races. I am hoping to move to Australia soon to marry my boyfriend. My favorite fruit is an apple. My mother is a dentist.

content.text: Hey how are you?
I am doing great! How are you?
Not bad. I am a big fan of horror novels. What are some of your favorites?
I love Stephen King's books! My favorite is It.
I love Stephen King too! My favorite is The Shining.
That is a great book! I have also been reading a lot of John Grisham novels lately.
I have not read any of his books. What are some of your favorites?
I really liked The Firm. It is a legal thriller.
I will have to check that out. I have always been interested in legal thrillers.
I also like to try new things. I recently started running races.
That is great! I used to run track in high school. I miss running.
I am trying to get in shape for my upcoming move to Australia.
That is exciting! Why are you moving to Australia?
I am going to marry my boyfriend who lives there.
That is wonderful! Congratulations!
Thank you! I am very excited.
I am sure you will be happy there. Australia seems like a great place to live.
I think so too. I am looking forward to starting my new life there.
I wish you the best of luck!
Thank you
